ff: master, 2f24ecf, https://github.com/bwickman97/ffmalloc
gd: master, 9e85978, https://github.com/UTSASRG/Guarder
hm: 11, 995ce07, https://github.com/GrapheneOS/hardened_malloc
iso: 1.2.5, 2670d5f, https://github.com/struct/isoalloc

mi: v1.7.7, fe61be8, https://github.com/microsoft/mimalloc
